subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
Discrimination
lead_paragraph: Bill Kennedy said he was “proud to be a gay man” after Sacramento Kings guard Rajon Rondo directed what the league called a “derogatory and offensive term” at him during a game this month.
snippet: Bill Kennedy said he was “proud to be a gay man” after Sacramento Kings guard Rajon Rondo directed what the league called a “derogatory and offensive term” at him during a game this month.
